name: Toyota Corolla
description: The Toyota Corolla is a reliable and fuel-efficient compact car. It offers a comfortable ride and comes with advanced safety features.

name: Honda Civic
description: The Honda Civic is a compact car known for its fuel efficiency and sporty design. It provides a comfortable ride, advanced technology, and a spacious cabin.

name: Tesla Model S
description: The Tesla Model S is an all-electric luxury sedan known for its impressive acceleration and long-range capabilities. It offers cutting-edge technology and a sleek, futuristic design.

name: Ford F-150
description: The Ford F-150 is a full-size pickup truck known for its ruggedness and versatility. It offers powerful engine options, spacious cabin, and excellent towing capacity.
